DX.MARGIN.RATS will allow the entry of initial margin rates for various trades. These rates will be used, as required, by various initial margin calculation routines.
Margin can be defined for Contract class level, Contract leve, Contract group level or customer level.

example : CU100055 customer 100015; CGINT2 is for contract group INT2; CT100 for contract 100; CCBONDS for contract class BONDS. This can also be given in combinations of one or more combinations each separated with a '-' sign.
On input the classification of type will be charged to '---' .
two alphabets
should be CC,CG,CT,CU to identify the classification.
Should be a valid ID in the respective files.
Should be a numerical value. no decimals allowed
